entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
